attributes.action: NHS workers and Care Workers should be exempt from paying TAX for the duration.
attributes.additional_details:
Key workers within a care setting or NHS setting are at the front of it all, risking their health and lives and living away from family to earn minimum wage and pay tax on that. 
Ask yourself, is your life worth minimum wage minus tax? 

No-one HAS to continue to work, yet people are opting to due to the nature of their job. We need to be recognised!
attributes.background: All NHS, care staff etc that are putting their jobs on the line and continuing to work should be TAX exempt for the duration of this.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
